data: Increase the Size of random PucPucs
Target two areas and combine them into two big Hitagi PucPucs
Target three areas, pops them and then refills with bigger PucPucs
Increase the Size of a few PucPucs and pop the rest
Increase the Size of PucPucs around Araragi
Targets X+ PucPucs turning them into leader PucPuc, then pops X of them after a size up.
Combine Mayoi PucPucs into one big Mayoi PucPuc
Increase the Size of PucPucs in the lower left area
Clear almost the entire Stage and refill with bigger PucPucs
Increase the Size of the smallest PucPucs on the Stage
For a short time all PucPucs become Nadeko and Araragi
For a short time a large amount of PucPucs will fill the stage beyond the boundary
Random effect(?) on 3 different areas of the Stage
Increase the Size of PucPucs in an area
Divide the screen into 6 piece and sets the size of all PucPucs within each area to a random value
Change PucPucs in the middle to a Special PucPuc that Suruga can connect to
Clears a portion of the Stage
Target three areas and change the PucPucs of each area into one specfic PucPuc
Creates Bomb PucPucs that can be tapped to blow up the area around them
Increase the Size of PucPucs around Araragi
Clears a portion of the Stage and create a Yotsugi PucPuc
Shoots up two fireworks that can be tapped to clear an area of the Stage and PucPucs will refill at the same size as the ones destroyed
Increase the Size of all of 2 random PucPucs
Turns a number of PucPucs into Money which when combined turns more PucPucs into money
Increases the Size of PucPucs around Araragi and drops them at the top of the screen where they explode immeditely
Increases the Size of almost all PucPucs by a small amount
Increases the Size of PucPucs in multiple areas
Clears center of the board and Size+ for surrounding PucPucs
Turns PucPucs into rocks which can be tapped to increase the Size of surrounding PucPucs
Clears random PucPucs besides Leader PucPucs
Size up on each half of the screen
Tap PucPuc Candy to Size up surrounding area
Size up section of the Board
Creates Araragi PucPucs which can be connected for High Score
Clears Top half of the board and Size up Bottom half
Creates Boku PucPucs that grow bigger when linked with Tomo
Target a Line and Size up some and Pop some PucPucs
